unit.name: Doomsday
unit.desc: Hey. Hey you.

unit.name: No Really, Doomsday
unit.desc: Hey over here.

unit.name: I Mean It, Doomsday!
unit.desc: HEY!!!

unit.name: Extremely Okay Ice Cube
unit.desc: This is fine. I'm okay with the events that are unfolding currently.

unit.name: Sleepy Bear
unit.desc: "Do not wake the bear. Waking the bear is a bad idea." - Everyone, ever.

unit.name: Gobatron's Crew
unit.desc: "What they lack in intelligence, they make up for in numbers." - Decim, the Firebringer

unit.name: Knight of Nerves
unit.desc: "He's a very strong fighter, but his nerves are as brittle as glass."

unit.name: Knight of Dissolvents
unit.desc: "Even the lightest armor stops his blade."

unit.name: Knight of Dragonfire
unit.desc: "Don't stand too close."

unit.name: Late Knight
unit.desc: "Always being held up by something."

unit.name: Knight of Drakebane
unit.desc: "This guy really hates dragons."

unit.name: Knight of Madness
unit.desc: "For a little guy he's awfully angry."

unit.name: Knights of OW HOT HOT
unit.desc: "THERE IS FIRE EVERYWHERE WHY."

unit.name: He Who Must Not Be Named
The Hero Previously Known as Lev
Lightning Conjuration
unit.desc: Lightning strikes where it pleases.

unit.name: Archive Golem
unit.desc: Those looking for their secrets can find them under archive "P" for pain.

unit.name: Cloud Conjuration
unit.desc: "Ooooh! Fluffy!" - Last Words of Bilmior the Adventurer

unit.name: Luminis Cherub
unit.desc: Shot through the heart, and you're to blame.

unit.name: Dawnglow Windfrog
unit.desc: "It's impossible to attack them when they keep knocking us off our feet!" - Frustrated Soldier

unit.name: Luminis Eagle
unit.desc: "Jarad, is that bird wearing a suit of armor?" - Unsuspecting Castle Guard

unit.name: Oracle of Luminis
unit.desc: Aether Oracles channel the strength of storms to protect their allies.

unit.name: Gladius Enforcer
unit.desc: Champion of the people, master of all armaments.

unit.name: Magic Scroll
unit.desc: "Brushing your finger along the wrong rune can unleash its stored magic to disastrous effects." - Last Lesson of Magi Neyaroi

unit.name: Karthos Lavafrog
unit.desc: "I once stepped on one, dang near melted my entire boot!" - Valjhor, Traveling Merchant

unit.name: Binded Imp
unit.desc: Fire Imp tongue is considered by many to be the spiciest food ingredient in the known world. Some days even they cannot handle it.

unit.name: Lava Slug
unit.desc: "Move! Get out of the way! It's going to trample you! ...Eventually." - Wyld Ranger

unit.name: Goblin Mercenaries
unit.desc: "What they lack in intelligence, they make up for in numbers." - Decim, the Firebringer

unit.name: Wyldwood Ranger
unit.desc: Protectors of Elaria, they tread the woodland as their second home.

unit.name: Wyldwood Spider
unit.desc: "Their poison can bring a full grown Tusker to its knees" - Elyse, Ranger

unit.name: Wyldwood Druid
unit.desc: "No one is allowed to touch these bunnies."

unit.name: Wyldwood Panther
unit.desc: When angered, they pull the energy of the earth around them to glow with awesome power.

unit.name: Dawnglow Scout
unit.desc: "Their scouts are invaluable, but we need to stop letting them name the new settlements. I can't take another Flytopia." - Expedition Researcher

unit.name: Earth Conjuration
unit.desc: "Sticks and stones can break my bones... No, that's the end of the rhyme." - Frans, Elaria Bartender

unit.name: Wyldwood Sapling
unit.desc: One touch can pull the life force right out of you.

unit.name: Seastone Serpent
unit.desc: "He looks so happy!" "Of course he does. He just found lunch!" - Boloros Sailors
